Package Restaurant_Billing_System

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Exit_WindowController
    Provide YES or NO option for Exit Window
    HomeController
    Provides the options in homepage
    Item
    Created to store variables for tableview
    LoginController
    Controller class for Login Prompt - Signing up to the system and use the features
    Monthly_EntryController
    Controls the option in Monthly Entry page which is basically the inputiing the info into the database
    Order_ListController
    Controls the option in Order List Page which retrieve data from the database
    ReceiptController  
    Restaurant_Billing_System
    Main Class
    Take_OrderController
    Controls the button in Take Order page
